author: Home Repair Tutor
description: KERDI-BOARD to drywall waterproofing tips…my drywall was slightly proud. So I removed the edge with a utility knife and filled the transition with thin-set mortar (ALL-SET). The next day, I apply more thin-set, used the KERDI trowel, and waterproofed the transition with 7 inch KERDI-BAND. For more shower remodeling tips, written tutorials, and step by step videos visit https://homerepairtutor.com 🔥#showerremodel #kerdiboard #bathroomremodel #homerenovation #diy #homerepairtutor
title: KERDI-BOARD to Drywall Waterproofing Tips - #shorts #showerremodel #homerepairtutor
